long_description: The water-resistant Obermeyer Lennox pants offer a flattering fit from the waist down for stand-out style on the ski slopes this winter. Polyester twill fabric with DuroGuard water repellency and critical seam taping helps keep you dry on snowy days. Reinforced seat, knees and scuff guards ensure long-lasting wear. Zippered hand pockets and one zippered rear pocket; ski pass ring. Hidden interior waist adjustment fine-tunes the fit; zippered hem gussets let you pull the pants on over footwear. Obermeyer Lennox Print pants have a slim fit. Closeout.
short_description: The water-resistant Obermeyer Lennox pants offer a flattering fit from the waist down for stand-out style on the ski slopes this winter.
